title: Aqara G2H Pro adds HomeKit alarm support with increased field of view to create a robust HomeKit Secure Video camera
content:
Today, Aqara has announced the US release of its camera designed as an Aqara hub and supporting HomeKit Secure Video. Aqara’s product lineups allow end users to build out a HomeKit setup at the lowest cost possible. Read on to learn more about the G2H Pro and its comparison to the original.

more…

The post Aqara G2H Pro adds HomeKit alarm support with increased field of view to create a robust HomeKit Secure Video camera appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: The new G2H Pro camera from Aqara increases the local recording options, adds additional field of view, and supports HomeKit Alarms.
